instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message:
Hello,

an 820-2879 came in with minor water damage around Q9807 area. 
green light OK
ppbus_g3h 12.52v
PP3V3_S5 OK

Does not boot. What do I measure first?

Thank you

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: Shorted power pads? These do not auto power on. Checked resistance to GND on pp3V42?

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: Thank you Duke! Shorting pads does nothing. Resistance to GND on pp3V42 is 0.311v

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: That is not resistance that is a diode mode, need resistance.

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: Sorry... Resistance to GND on pp3V42 is 21.10KOhm

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: That may be a bit low but now 100% sure. Look carefully for corrosion around U6990, did anything get liquid around that? Battery charging?

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: Battery is charging. U6990 area is clean, minor corrosion on unconnected R5001 pin 2.

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: Checked all rails for shorts? Any corrosion around the TPS51125? PM_PWRBTN_L doing anything when you press power button?

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: Found short in ppvcore_s0_cpu line, diode mode is 0.014v. Also ppvcore_s0_mcp is 0.015v. No corrosion around TPS51125. PM_PWRBTN_L is going from 3.3v to almost 0 when shorting SMC_ONOFF pads.

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: Resistance to GND is the only way to check for real shorts. Diode mode measures a voltage drop, not quite the same.

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: ppvcore_s0_cpu and ppvcore_s0_mcp resistance to GND is 24 Ohm

threads.title: 820-2879 Green light no start
threads.message: and that is no short. I would say either crap under the SMC or the MCP is dead.
